name: Before Dawn Breaks
description:
You and Astra have fought side by side for many years. Her conviction and strength have moved many more to take up arms, and tomorrow, all she has fought for will finally culminate in a great, bloody battle. But that's tomorrow, and this is tonight, where you spend a final, restless night in front of the campfire.

NOTICE: The credits page is currently bugged where you can't back out of the credits to the main menu... so please either view the credits when you've finished playing or refresh the page afterwards. Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for playing my first completed VN!!

Before Dawn Breaks was made for the O2A2 jam game and therefore features only 1 sprite, 1 sfx, 1 music track and a 1k word script.
